languages.text: "Прах прочих почтенных мертвецов, чей покой потревожили, будет перенесен в часовню-реликварий. Мы будем проводить над ними искупительные обряды денно и нощно, и тысячи членов экипажа смогут с благоговением обратиться к древним останкам с молитвой о даровании здравия Лорд-капитану и династии".

traits.locale_text: "Прах прочих почтенных мертвецов, чей покой потревожили, будет перенесен в часовню-реликварий. Мы будем проводить над ними искупительные обряды денно и нощно, и тысячи членов экипажа смогут с благоговением обратиться к древним останкам с молитвой о даровании здравия Лорд-капитану и династии".

languages.text: "The ashes of the other eminent dead, whose rest was disturbed, will be transferred to the reliquary chapel. Rites of redemption will be held day and night. Thousands of the ship's crew will be allowed to kneel before the relics and pray for the Lord Captain's health and the dynasty's prosperity."
languages.original_text: "Прах прочих почтенных мертвецов, чей покой потревожили, будет перенесен в часовню-реликварий. Мы будем проводить над ними искупительные обряды денно и нощно, и тысячи членов экипажа смогут с благоговением обратиться к древним останкам с молитвой о даровании здравия Лорд-капитану и династии".

Thousands of the ship's crew will be allowed to kneel before the relics and pray for the Lord Captain's health and the dynasty's prosperity."

"The ashes of the other eminent dead, whose rest was disturbed, will be transferred to the reliquary chapel. Rites of redemption will be held day and night. Thousands of the ship's crew will be allowed to kneel before the relics and pray for the Lord Captain's health and the dynasty's prosperity."

"The ashes of the other eminent dead, whose rest was disturbed, will be transferred to the reliquary chapel. Rites of redemption will be held day and night. Thousands of the ship's crew will be allowed to kneel before the relics and pray for the Lord Captain's health and the dynasty's prosperity."

"The ashes of the other eminent dead, whose rest was disturbed, will be transferred to the reliquary chapel. Rites of redemption will be held day and night. Thousands of the ship's crew will be allowed to kneel before the relics and pray for the Lord Captain's health and the dynasty's prosperity."

languages.text: « Les cendres des autres honorables défunts dont la dépouille a été profanée seront transférées dans la chapelle, où nous accomplirons des rites de rédemption jour et nuit. Des milliers de membres de l'équipage pourront s'agenouiller devant les reliques et prier pour {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et la prospérité de la dynastie. »
languages.original_text: "The ashes of the other eminent dead, whose rest was disturbed, will be transferred to the reliquary chapel. Rites of redemption will be held day and night. Thousands of the ship's crew will be allowed to kneel before the relics and pray for the Lord Captain's health and the dynasty's prosperity."

traits.locale_text: « Les ossements des autres honorables défunts dont la dépouille a été profanée seront transférés dans la chapelle, où nous accomplirons des rites de rédemption jour et nuit. Des milliers de membres de l'équipage pourront s'agenouiller devant les reliques et prier pour {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et la prospérité de la dynastie. »

languages.text: «Las cenizas perturbadas de otros fallecidos ilustres se transferirán a la capilla del relicario. Realizaremos ritos de redención día y noche. Miles de miembros de la tripulación de la nave podrán arrodillarse ante las reliquias y rezar por la salud de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y la prosperidad de la dinastía».
languages.original_text: "The ashes of the other eminent dead, whose rest was disturbed, will be transferred to the reliquary chapel. Rites of redemption will be held day and night. Thousands of the ship's crew will be allowed to kneel before the relics and pray for the Lord Captain's health and the dynasty's prosperity."

traits.locale_text: «Los huesos perturbados de otros fallecidos ilustres se transferirán a la capilla del relicario. Realizaremos ritos de redención día y noche. Miles de miembros de la tripulación de la nave podrán arrodillarse ante las reliquias y rezar por la salud de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y la prosperidad de la dinastía».

languages.text: “又一位伟大逝者的骨灰遭到了侵扰，她的遗物将被转运到圣骨礼拜堂。在那里，救赎仪式将不分昼夜举行。成千上万名船员将会跪在圣物前，为舰长大人的健康与王朝的繁荣祈祷。”
languages.original_text: "The ashes of the other eminent dead, whose rest was disturbed, will be transferred to the reliquary chapel. Rites of redemption will be held day and night. Thousands of the ship's crew will be allowed to kneel before the relics and pray for the Lord Captain's health and the dynasty's prosperity."

traits.locale_text: “又一名伟大逝者的安息遭到了扰乱，她的遗物将被转运到圣骨礼拜堂。在那里，救赎仪式将不分昼夜举行。成千上万名船员将会跪在圣物前，为舰长大人的健康与王朝的繁荣祈祷。”

languages.text: 「休息が妨げられた他の著名な死者の遺灰は、聖遺物礼拝堂に移されることになった。昼夜を問わず、贖罪の儀式が執り行われる。数千人の乗組員が聖遺物の前に跪き、ロード・キャプテンの健康と王朝の繁栄を祈ることだろう」
languages.original_text: "The ashes of the other eminent dead, whose rest was disturbed, will be transferred to the reliquary chapel. Rites of redemption will be held day and night. Thousands of the ship's crew will be allowed to kneel before the relics and pray for the Lord Captain's health and the dynasty's prosperity."

traits.locale_text: 「休息が妨げられた他の著名な死者の骨は、聖遺物礼拝堂に移されることになった。昼夜を問わず、贖罪の儀式が執り行われる。数千人の乗組員が聖遺物の前に跪き、ロード・キャプテンの健康と王朝の繁栄を祈ることだろう」

languages.text: "Die Asche der anderen ehrwürdigen Toten, deren Ruhe gestört wurde, werden in die Reliquienkapelle gebracht. Wir werden Tag und Nacht Läuterungsriten ausführen. Tausende Mitglieder der Crew des Schiffs erhalten die Erlaubnis, vor den Relikten auf die Knie zu gehen und für die Gesundheit des Lord Captains und den Wohlstand der Dynastie zu beten."
languages.original_text: "The ashes of the other eminent dead, whose rest was disturbed, will be transferred to the reliquary chapel. Rites of redemption will be held day and night. Thousands of the ship's crew will be allowed to kneel before the relics and pray for the Lord Captain's health and the dynasty's prosperity."

traits.locale_text: "Die Knochen der anderen ehrwürdigen Toten, deren Ruhe gestört wurde, werden in die Reliquienkapelle gebracht. Wir werden Tag und Nacht Läuterungsriten ausführen. Tausende Mitglieder der Crew des Schiffs erhalten die Erlaubnis, vor den Relikten auf die Knie zu gehen und für die Gesundheit des Lord Captains und den Wohlstand der Dynastie zu beten."

languages.text: "İstirahatleri sırasında rahatsız edilen diğer saygıdeğer ölülerimizin külleri, kutsal emanet odası şapeline nakledilecek. Gece gündüz kefaret ayinleri gerçekleştirilecek. Binlerce tayfaya yadigârların önünde diz çökme, Lord Kaptan'ın sıhhati ve hanedanlığın refahı için dua etme izni verilecek."
languages.original_text: "The ashes of the other eminent dead, whose rest was disturbed, will be transferred to the reliquary chapel. Rites of redemption will be held day and night. Thousands of the ship's crew will be allowed to kneel before the relics and pray for the Lord Captain's health and the dynasty's prosperity."
